channel.title: 100k per Yell Message?

item.title: 100k per Yell Message?

Usman, I told you what your problem was?

item.title: 100k per Yell Message?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“huiho, post:11, topic:351121”]Never mind, I just fixed it around… This works:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && muted == false) {

	if(playerHasItem(995, 100000)) {
	deleteItem(995, 100000);		
	
	String titles = "";
     
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Administrator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Donator Mod]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Donator Admin]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Super Donator Mod]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Super Donator Admin]- ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
	} else {	
	
	sM("You need at least 100k to yell a message!");
	
	}

}[/code][/quote]I’m a superhero

Read full topic

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && muted == false) {

item.title: 100k per Yell Message?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:351121”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=447479.msg3284029#msg3284029 date=1280084212]
it keeps spammers away…
[/quote]Yea, but if you made a yell timer, and if you made it check for 100k (so that you know it’s not a new player) it should stop them too.[/quote]

Yeah, but the starter gives some money…

And, the code didn’t work… People can still yell without having the money.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && muted == false) {

	if(playerHasItem(995)) {
	deleteItem(995, 100000);		
	}
	String titles = "";
     
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Administrator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Donator Mod]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Donator Admin]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Super Donator Mod]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Super Donator Admin]- ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
	} else {	
	
	sM("You need at least 100k to yell a message!");

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: 100k per Yell Message?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

How do I make it so you need AT LEAST 100k to yell? This is the code I have right now.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && muted == false) {

	String titles = "";
     
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Administrator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Donator Mod]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Donator Admin]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Super Donator Mod]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Super Donator Admin]- ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
	} else {	
	
	sM("You need at least 100k to yell a message!");
	}

}[/code]

Read full topic
